caption.p: Supplementary Fig. 3 Probability of loss of function intolerance increases with distance from the GBA locus.
a) The proportion of genes that are LoF intolerant increases with distance from the GBA locus (pLI > 0.9), as defined by the gnomAD Consortium using their gene‐level constraint metric

b) The median pLI increases across the cis‐ (green), trans‐intrachromosomal (distant on the same chromosome, orange), or trans‐interchromosomal (on a different chromosome, purple). Median is shown on plots.
Click here for additional data file.
